basic.Peptide Name: WjAMP-1 (C-terminal domain of hevein; Plant defensin)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (IC50=27.5 µg/ml), Pseudomonas cichorii (IC50=13.8 µg/ml), Pseudomonas glumae (IC50=20 µg/ml), Pseudomonas plantarii (IC50=22.5 µg/ml), Agrobacterium tumefaciens (IC50=12.5 µg/ml).Fungi:Alternaria alternata (IC50=5.8 µg/ml), Botrytis cinerea (IC50=15 µg/ml), Fusarium solani (IC50=8.4 µg/ml), Magnaporte grisea (IC50=80 µg/ml).
